title: jbdee
author: jbdee
created_time: May 26, 2023, 10:26:04 PMLast edit: February 29, 2024, 01:06:20 PM by jbdee
content: Hi,I want to spend my USD from my personal Payoneer account (verified and has always been in good standing for years) for BTC or USDT or USDC (I'm open to other main crypto).I can give you 1% extra.My Telegram: @jbdeePlease post a message here first before contacting me on Telegram, so I can verify it is you.I don't send first, I don't want any disputes on my Payoneer account, we can do any amount to build the trust if needed.UPDATES:13/12/2023 - 1470 USD available14/12/2023 - 1420 USD available29/02/2024 - 0 USD available, I lock the topic

comments.author: jbdee
comments.body: Quote from: jbdee on May 26, 2023, 10:26:04 PMHi,I want to spend my USD from my personal Payoneer account (verified and has always been in good standing) for BTC or USDT or USDC (I'm open to other main crypto).I'd like a 1:1 rate if possible.My Telegram: @jbdeePlease post a message here first before contacting me on Telegram, so I can verify it is you.I don't need $3000 anymore, but I need around $500 of BTC monthly, starting next month.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: jbdee on June 01, 2023, 10:07:03 AMI need around $500 of BTC monthly, starting next month.Look into Bisq.network, that's probably your best bet for regular peer to peer transactions.  I don't see payoneer as a payment option they support, but if you are capable of using other services it's been my favorite way to exchange fiat to BTC and vice versa.https://docs.bisq.network/payment-methods#supported-fiat-payment-methods

comments.author: jbdee
comments.body: I need Payoneer that's why I'm asking here, I didn't find any reliable seller on other platforms since localbitcoins closed.

comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: Payoneer always requests a lot of documents from personal payments because they only accept business payments. So, I think it's best to withdraw the funds to your local account directly and buy Bitcoin. Quote from: jbdee on June 02, 2023, 03:21:30 PMI need Payoneer that's why I'm asking here, I didn't find any reliable seller on other platforms since localbitcoins closed.Quote from: jbdee on May 26, 2023, 10:26:04 PMHi,I want to spend my USD from my personal Payoneer account (verified and has always been in good standing) for BTC or USDT or USDC (I'm open to other main crypto).I'd like a 1:1 rate if possible.My Telegram: @jbdeePlease post a message here first before contacting me on Telegram, so I can verify it is you.

comments.author: jbdee
comments.body: I've transferred thousands and they never asked anything, below $700 for each transfer. And for payment by cards they don't ask anything even for more than $1000.

comments.author: steve5946
comments.created_time: June 05, 2023, 08:23:32 PMLast edit: June 05, 2023, 09:18:28 PM by steve5946
comments.body: Quote from: jbdee on June 05, 2023, 05:09:07 PMI've transferred thousands and they never asked anything, below $700 for each transfer. And for payment by cards they don't ask anything even for more than $1000.It only happens when a user send you funds more than once. Around $5000, they will request for business documents, source of funds, and if you can't provide any of these. They will probably refund the fund back to the sender.

comments.author: jbdee
comments.body: But I'll be the one sending the USD, so if the person has a business or simply charge me for a "service" it should be fine, I can write on the transfer reference that it is to pay some service.
